I recently had the pleasure of undergoing surgery for my detached meniscus at Aptus Day Surgery, as most hospital could not accommodate an early slot for my injury to be fixed.
I cannot express how grateful I am for the exceptional care I received. From the moment I arrived, I was met with compassion and understanding, staff which greatly eased my pre-op anxiety.

The pre-operative care was immaculate. Nurse Esther took her time to attend to all of my needs, answering my questions and ensuring I felt comfortable every step of the way right up to anaesthesia.
Her patience and kindness made a world of difference.

Post-operatively, the entire team was dedicated to ensuring that I was well enough to be discharged even though I was throwing up quite a bit. Once I was well enough I had a session of physio at the day surgery so that I was braced for slow walking again.

They went above and beyond, even wheeling me to the taxi stand to ensure I got home safely.

Overall, Aptus Day Surgery is a five-star facility. I am immensely grateful for the care I received and would highly recommend it to anyone in need of surgery. Thank you, Aptus, for making my experience so pleasant!

I just wanted to take a moment to compliment the front counter staff. They were patient, friendly, and took the time to address all of my queries regarding the payment method when I was checking on behalf of my dad.
Their professionalism and helpfulness were greatly appreciated. Kudos to them for making the experience so pleasant!

Incredible surgery centre. The staff are amazing. I unfortunately had 3 operations in the space of 1 week with 2 over night stays and cannot speak highly enough of this place. The staff are amazing, the nurses are so kind and caring. The facilities are great. Very clean. If I never need digital attention again this will be where I will coming.
